name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「輪廻転生」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Reincarnation＂【#天音かなた4周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [APoXxcv37GU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "INTERNET YAMERO" in a digital space.
Performance of the song "Kyu-kurarin" in a cozy bedroom setting.
Transition to a new scene where Kanata is standing in a ruined city.

subtitles.original: せーの、インターネット最高！
subtitles.english: Ready, the Internet is the best!

subtitles.original: ほとばしるエクスタシー　甘い夢を見せてナイリスリ
subtitles.english: Gushing ecstasy, show me a sweet dream, nicely.

subtitles.original: 指先で感じる　泳ぐ電子の海インターネットボーイ
subtitles.english: Feel it at your fingertips, swimming in a sea of electrons, Internet Boy.

subtitles.original: 悲しみ舞い散る　暗闇の中インターネットゲイズ
subtitles.english: Sadness fluttering down, in the darkness, Internet Gaze.

subtitles.original: あなたの隣微笑む　忘れないでいてねインターネットガール
subtitles.english: Smiling by your side, don't forget me, Internet Girl.

subtitles.original:
どんまい、おわた。半袖、胸毛、サゲ。俺、よし、鬱氏、久しぶりにワロタ。
お前ら、これは、落ちてなくて、おにぎりだったんだよね。
subtitles.english:
Don't mind, it's over. Short sleeves, chest hair, down. Me, good, depressed, first laugh in a while.
You guys, this wasn't falling, it was an onigiri, right?

subtitles.original: ぷぷ。ピノキオ、ハゲ、ゲット！
subtitles.english: Pupu. Pinocchio, bald, got it!

subtitles.original: むりぽ、おわコン、俺の惨状、うぷし、にゃあ、おわた、いち、の、ははです。
subtitles.english: Impossible, dead content, my disastrous state, uploaded, nyaa, it's over, one, of, it's my mom.

subtitles.original: 久しぶりにワロタ。おわた。半袖、胸毛、サゲ。俺、よし、鬱氏、は、ゲット！
subtitles.english: First laugh in a while. Over. Short sleeves, chest hair, down. Me, good, depressed, is got!

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き好き...
subtitles.english: Love love love love love love love love love love love love love love...

subtitles.original: 青白いモニター越しの光を通し
subtitles.english: Through the light of the pale monitor...

subtitles.original: オタクの孤独を癒やして回る
subtitles.english: I go around healing the otaku's loneliness.

subtitles.original: わたしはインターネットの天使なのだ
subtitles.english: For I am the angel of the internet.

subtitles.original:
きゅうくらりん
作詞・作曲：いよわ
subtitles.english:
Kyu-kurarin
Lyrics/Composition: Iyowa

subtitles.original: うるさくないた　文字盤を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was looking at the dial that was crying noisily.

subtitles.original: きっときっと鏡越し　8時過ぎの匂い
subtitles.english: Surely, surely through the mirror, the smell of past 8 o'clock.

subtitles.original: しらけ切った顔　変わってなくて良かった
subtitles.english: I'm glad your bored face hasn't changed.

subtitles.original: ピンクの植木鉢の　ぐちょぐちょした心の
subtitles.english: In the pink flowerpot, of my squishy heart...

subtitles.original: そばに　大きく育ったもの
subtitles.english: ...nearby, something that has grown large.

subtitles.original: 結ばれた蕾が　こんなにも愚かしい
subtitles.english: The tied buds are so foolish.

subtitles.original: ああ　化石になっちゃうよ　ああ　取り繕っていたいな
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm turning into a fossil. Ah, I want to keep up appearances.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと笑わなきゃね　大した取り柄もないから
subtitles.english: I have to smile properly, since I don't have any great merits.

subtitles.original: 空っぽが埋まらないこと　全部バレてたらどうしよう
subtitles.english: What if they find out that the emptiness can't be filled?

subtitles.original: ああ　あなたの右隣　わたし　きゅうくらりん
subtitles.english: Ah, to your right, I'm Kyu-kurarin.

subtitles.original: 例えば今夜眠って　目覚めたときに
subtitles.english: For example, if I sleep tonight and when I wake up...

subtitles.original: 起きる理由がひとつも　見つからない
subtitles.english: ...I can't find a single reason to get up.

subtitles.original: 朝が来たら　わたしは
subtitles.english: When morning comes, I...

subtitles.original: どうする？
subtitles.english: ...what will I do?

subtitles.original: うるさくないた　文字盤を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was looking at the dial that was crying noisily.

subtitles.original: 一歩一歩後ずさり　「また明日ね」とぽつり
subtitles.english: Stepping back bit by bit, muttering "See you tomorrow."

subtitles.original: 喜びより　安堵が先に来ちゃった
subtitles.english: Relief came before joy.

subtitles.original: 思い出にびしびし　映る細かな日々が
subtitles.english: The detailed days reflected vividly in my memories...

subtitles.original: こんなにも恐ろしい
subtitles.english: ...are so terrifying.

subtitles.original: ああ　あなたが知ってしまう　ああ　取り繕っていたいな
subtitles.english: Ah, you'll find out. Ah, I want to keep up appearances.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと笑わなきゃね　大切が壊れちゃうから
subtitles.english: I have to smile properly, because what's important will break.

subtitles.original: 幸せな明日を願うけど　底なしの孤独をどうしよう
subtitles.english: I wish for a happy tomorrow, but what should I do about this bottomless loneliness?

subtitles.original: もう　呻き声しか出ない　わたし　きゅうくらりん
subtitles.english: I can only let out groans now, I'm Kyu-kurarin.

subtitles.original: ああ　虹がかかっている空
subtitles.english: Ah, the sky with a rainbow...

subtitles.original: きれいと思いたくて
subtitles.english: ...I want to think it's beautiful.

subtitles.original: 焦がれては逃げられないこと　みんなには配らないこと
subtitles.english: That I can't run away from my longings, that I won't share them with everyone.

subtitles.original: もう　どうしようもないの　わたし　きゅうくらりん
subtitles.english: There's nothing I can do anymore, I'm Kyu-kurarin.

subtitles.original: そばに　手繰り寄せた末路
subtitles.english: Nearby, the end I pulled toward myself.

subtitles.original: 枯れ落ちた蕾が　こんなにも穢らわしくて　淫ら
subtitles.english: The withered buds are so filthy and obscene.

subtitles.original: ああ　呪いになっちゃうよ　ああ　諦めたって言わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's becoming a curse. Ah, I have to say I've given up.

subtitles.original: 頭の中で　ノイズが鳴り止まないから
subtitles.english: Because the noise in my head won't stop ringing.

subtitles.original: 空っぽが埋まらないこと　全部バレてたらどうしよう
subtitles.english: What if they find out that the emptiness can't be filled?

subtitles.original: ああ　あの子の言う通り　終わりなんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, just as she said, it's the end.

subtitles.original: ああ　幸せになっちゃうよ　ああ　死ぬのがつらいな
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm going to be happy. Ah, it's hard to die.

subtitles.original: 全部無駄になったら　愛した罰を受けるから
subtitles.english: If everything becomes in vain, I'll take the punishment for having loved.

subtitles.original: 酷く優しいあなたの　胸で泣けたならどうしよう
subtitles.english: What if I could cry on the chest of your terribly kind self?

subtitles.original: 最後見たのはそんな夢　わたし　ちゅうぶらりん
subtitles.english: That was the dream I saw at the end, I'm dangling mid-air.
